metadata.title: CVE-2020-13847 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Sylabs Singularity 3.0 through 3.5 lacks support for an Integrity Check.Singularity's sign and verify commands do not sign metadata found in theglobal header or data object descriptors of a SIF file.

criterions.comment: singularity-container: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
